description: MYERS singled through the left side.
BUCKNER grounded into double play ss to 2b to 1b; MYERS out on the play.
SULLIVAN stole second, advanced to third on a throwing error by c.
BREWER struck out swinging to catcher.
CORBITT advanced to second on a wild pitch.
INGLE singled through the left side, RBI; GRICE advanced to third; CORBITT scored.
HAWKINS homered to right field, 3 RBI; INGLE scored; GRICE scored.
WAGNER advanced to second on a wild pitch.
MacINTOSH out at second c to 2b, caught stealing.
BREWER grounded out to ss; BLACKWELL advanced to second.
GRICE singled through the left side, RBI; BLACKWELL scored.
FRENCH singled through the left side; FAIREY advanced to second.
BLACKWELL reached on a fielder's choice to shortstop; FRENCH out at second ss to 2b.
SULLIVAN singled through the right side.
RABON reached on a fielder's choice to pitcher; SULLIVAN out at second p to ss.
MacINTOSH singled down the rf line; RABON advanced to third.
TAYLOR struck out swinging, reached first on a wild pitch.
HENNESSY walked; TAYLOR advanced to second.
MAYNARD out at first 1b to 2b to 1b; HENNESSY advanced to second; TAYLOR advanced to third.
BUCKNER singled to center field, 2 RBI; HENNESSY scored; TAYLOR scored.
SULLIVAN flied out to lf to left center.
HAWKINS flied out to lf to left center.
RINEHART doubled down the 1b line; RABON advanced to third.
MAYNARD walked, RBI; HAMILTON advanced to second; SHERROD advanced to third; RABON scored.
BLACKWELL out at first c to 1b, picked off.
BUCKNER flied out to lf to left center.
RABON singled to right center; SULLIVAN advanced to second.
MacINTOSH grounded out to 3b; RABON advanced to second; SULLIVAN advanced to third.
SHERROD advanced to second on a wild pitch.
MYERS doubled down the lf line, RBI; MAYNARD advanced to third; SHERROD scored.
BUCKNER grounded out to ss, RBI; MYERS no advance; MAYNARD scored.
FRENCH homered to left field, RBI.
BREWER homered to right field, 2 RBI; BLACKWELL scored.
CORBITT struck out swinging, out at first c to 1b.
CARUSO popped up to ss to left center.
